captions.text:
The strong dark eyebrows..
Can you see?
And the thighs are like horse muscles..
I met my ideal type guy, too

The hairy chest..
Such a masculine guy..

- Hey, wait..
- You, too?
I met my ideal one, too
He's got perfect 7.7 head figure
I'm falling in love..

When I first saw you,
I could hardly concentrate

I'm being careful
not to be too obvious

What do I do
I feel so restless

What do I do
My heart is shrinking

You come close to me
But then walk away
How strange

Should I laugh or cry
Please leave me alone

You always change your mind
It's confusing
You are..
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink, hey
Walking down this street alone
Why it feels so long today

One sunny day,
One thoughtless word
But I miss you more and more
What do you want me to do
I'm clueless and confused.. no

Again today..
You make my heart flutter and sink

So selfishly..
You come into my heart and you're gone
Then I try to give you the cold shoulder

Avoiding you..
Acting like I don't care
But your eyes and your touch
Make my lips parched

You walk away
Then you come to me
Again today..

Should I laugh or cry
It is annoying

You always change your mind
It is confusing
You are..
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink, hey~

Your mind
Your heart
My heart flutters

Loving you only..
Thinking of you only..
My heart flutters again
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Flutter and sink, hey
You make my heart flutter and sink
Oh, how can I hold you in my heart
Flutter and sink, hey
Flutter and sink, hey
Flutter and sink, hey
